snippet: A report issued Wednesday accused the government of DeKalb County of “appalling corruption and a stunning absence of leadership,” and urged the county’s interim chief executive to resign.
abstract: Official report accuses government officials in DeKalb County, Ga, of widespread misconduct and corruption, and calls for resignation of Lee N May, county's  interim chief executive.
lead_paragraph: A report issued Wednesday accused the government of DeKalb County of “appalling corruption and a stunning absence of leadership,” and urged the county’s interim chief executive to resign.

headline.main: Georgia: Report Seeks Dekalb Government Shake-Up
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Report Seeks Dekalb Government Shake-Up
